overview:
Nicolas Cloutier is a serial entrepreneur and head of perfica3 inc. an interactive advertising agency based in Quebec, Canada. Nicolas started perfica3 inc. from his house in August 2009, since then the company has done more than 100 projects per year and is still growing.

Nicolas Cloutier started to sharpen his entrepreneurial skills in 1998 with the founding of a technology R&D company called Simusoft3D Productions developing 3D technologies based on ATI, Matrox, Nvidia and Discreet’s technology from that time. Nicolas left the company in 2003.

As a self maker and always looking for new challenges, Nicolas decided to enter the web hosting industry and develop a unique 25$ per month dedicated server offering that still to this day no one achieved to offer. The company went from an initial investment of 50$ to 150,000$ in less than 3 months. Nicolas sold the company soon after.
